title: "Install Seurat v5"
output:
  html_document:
    theme: united
    df_print: kable
date: 'Compiled: `r format(Sys.Date(), "%B %d, %Y")`'
---
***

Copy the code below to install Seurat v5.

```{r, eval=FALSE}
remotes::install_github("mojaveazure/seurat-object", "seurat5", quiet = TRUE)
remotes::install_github("satijalab/seurat", "seurat5", quiet = TRUE)
remotes::install_github("satijalab/seurat-data", "seurat5", quiet = TRUE)
remotes::install_github("stuart-lab/signac", "seurat5", quiet = TRUE)
remotes::install_github("bnprks/BPCells") # for on-disk capabilities
```
